exceptions.tactic: intros TH ord J n c H.

exceptions.exn: The reference H was not found in the current environment.
The reference c' was not found in the current environment.
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
The reference ht_ord_refl was not found in the current environment.

original: apply Build_IncreasingSeparationAlgebra. intros TH ord J n c H. destruct (H (S n) short1) as [c' [H1 H2]]. exists c'. split. - apply H1. - apply ht_ord_refl.
